name: JavaFX Plugin
summary: Maven plugin to run JavaFX 11+ applications.
description: The JavaFX plugin allows you to execute JavaFX applications via Maven, independent of whether the application is a modular or non-modular application. The second purpose of this plugin is to enable developers to create custom runtime images for JavaFX applications via the help of the jlink command / tool.

name: GluonFX Plugin
summary: Create native apps for desktop or mobile devices.
description: GluonFX plugin for maven leverages GraalVM, OpenJDK and JavaFX 11+, by compiling into native code the Java Client application and all its required dependencies, so it can directly be executed as a native application on the target platform.
tags: maven, plugin, gluon, mobile, embedded, iOS, android, iPhone, iPad, graalvm, native

name: Scenic View
summary: Inspect / debug the scene graph of your application.
description: Scenic View is a JavaFX application designed to make it simple to understand the current state of your application scenegraph, and to also easily manipulate properties of the scenegraph without having to keep editing your code. This lets you find bugs, and get things pixel perfect without having to do the compile-check-compile dance.

name: Scene Builder
summary: WYSIWYG editor for building your user interface.
description: Scene builder is an editor for rapid application development via drag and drop. Separation of design and logic files allows for team members to quickly and easily focus on their specific layer of application development.
tags: UI builder, WYSIWYG, editor, user interface, client

name: JPro
summary: Deploy and run your applications in browsers.
description: JPro is a solution that allows you to run your JavaFX application inside browsers. The application gets executed on the server and its scene graph gets serialized, transferred to the browser, and recreated via HTML and JavaScript.
tags: web, browser, web app, web application

name: Gluon Mobile
summary: Deploy to mobile devices like iPhones, iPads, or Android.
description: Gluon Mobile Provides Fresh, Modern UIs, and Cloud Connectivity. Make use of hardware features on mobile devices in a platform-agnostic way. Gluon Mobile makes available all the storage systems, accelerometers, screen details, GPS devices, and more in a device-independent fashion.

name: TestFX
summary: A unit testing framework for JavaFX.
description: A fluent and clean API. Flexible setup and cleanup of JavaFX test fixtures. Simple robots to simulate user interactions. Rich collection of matchers and assertions to verify expected states of JavaFX scene-graph nodes.

name: CSSFX
description: CSSFX enhances developer productivity by providing CSS reloading functionality in your running application. While developing you can run your JavaFX application, modify some CSS sources in your preferred editor, hit save button (or CTLR+S or CMD-S) and your JavaFX application is modified in real time.

name: FXSampler
description: FXSampler is a small framework for creating a consistent set of samples (examples, demos) for the controls contained within a JavaFX library. FXSampler is a subproject of ControlsFX.

name: FXIconCreator
summary: Tool for creating icons for Windows,Linux,OSX,...
description: Small app to create icon sets (multi resolution) for Linux, Windows, OSX from a single PNG imageReason for creating such an app was that I had to create app icons out of png files but I was tired to always fire up different virtual machine only to use the native tools to create the icons. All web based icon converter are converting the icons in the wrong format (not as multi resolution).

name: QF-Test
summary: Automated GUI testing for Java, Web and Windows applications
description: QF-Test is a fully integrated tool for automated GUI testing for Java, Web and Windows applications.

name: SmartFinder
summary: SmartFinder allows you to use an innovative way to search for your files on the Desktop with an experience similar to Google's search
description: With SmartFinder you have everything just a click away and in a single view! From the ability to open the first relevant files already while typing the words to be searched, to links with meta-data to directly filter the results, to viewing an extract of the document with the searched words highlighted!
tags: desktop search, windows search, finder, web application
